211722135213915999.NAME: I will have my axe, cur!

12598372729412186.NAME: I'm not sure how you got your hands on it again, but I'll have that axe back now!
12598372729412186.BNAM:
;Hlormar Wine-Sot
AiWander 0 0 0 0 0 0
ModDisposition -100
SetFight 100
StartCombat Player
Goodbye

971224391425227064.NAME: It is good to have my axe in my hands again!

307149423293015607.NAME: That is a poor, poor decision on your part, friend.
307149423293015607.BNAM:
;Hlormar Wine-Sot
AiWander 0 0 0 0 0 0
Journal "MV_AbusedHealer" 80
ModDisposition -100
SetFight 100
StartCombat Player
Goodbye

9126137691851022437.NAME: Ah, thank you friend. I noticed you admiring the way I fought that old witch, even without the aid of a sharp blade. I don't have any money or treasure to thank you for your help with, but I can give you a few pointers that will help you be stronger in a fight.
9126137691851022437.BNAM:
;Hlormar Wine-Sot
Player->RemoveItem "cloudcleaver_unique" 1
AddItem "cloudcleaver_unique" 1
Player->ModStrength 2
AiWander 0,0,60,30,10,0,0,0,0,0,0
MessageBox "Your Strength has increased by 2."
Journal "MV_abusedhealer" 85

17661150863116919945.NAME: Yes, let me hold her in my hands. Ah, my pretty, I've missed you so....
17661150863116919945.BNAM:
;Hlormar Wine-Sot
Choice "Here's your axe, Hlormar." 6 "It belongs with a true warrior. Me." 7

30762243651249824115.NAME: Yes, let me hold her in my hands. Ah, my pretty, I've missed you so....
30762243651249824115.BNAM:
;Hlormar Wine-Sot
Choice "Here's your axe, Hlormar." 6 "It belongs with a true warrior. Me." 7

80832147577017222.NAME: Ah, me axe Cloudcleaver. A fine blade she is, though now I fear what that witch's touch will do to it. Me own father Balmir used it himself to slay the Terror of Wrothgar's Quagmire, he did. Now granted the Terror turned out to be a new born nix-hound eating the neighbor's marshmerrow, but me father found him and slew him nevertheless in as grand a fashion as I have ever borne witness to. I cannot wait to have the blade in my hands again, then I'll use it to take that witch's head clean off, I will.

117453099256346415.NAME: A fine axe it is. Perhaps the best ever crafted.

75769062165320288.NAME: Hlormar's obsession with that axe led to his death. I'll leave it with someone who can use it well. I thank you for your help stranger. I think that hothead would've killed me had you not intervened. Here, take these potions as my gift to you, and seek me out if you ever require my services in the future.
75769062165320288.BNAM:
;Sosia Caristiana
Journal "MV_AbusedHealer" 75
player->additem "P_Restore_Health_E" 1
player->additem "P_Restore_Fatigue_Q" 1
player->additem "P_Fortify_Health_Q" 1
removeitem "P_Restore_Health_E" 1
removeitem "P_Restore_Fatigue_Q" 1
removeitem "P_Fortify_Health_Q" 1

58882709432450534.NAME: Oh, I don't think he's ready to get it back quite yet. I can still see the rage burning in those tiny Nord eyes of his. However, if he meets me in three days at the Mage's Guild Hall in Caldera I will return everything I have of his, but not a minute sooner. Tell him that is Sosia's offer.
